resources.string: Now you are keeping yourself and others safe
For proper functionality of eRouška, Bluetooth has to be enabled
For proper functionality of eRouška, Location Services have to be enabled
For proper functionality of eRouška, Battery Saver has to be disabled
Application is paused. Don\'t forget to resume it.
Application is running and anonymously recording phones nearby.
With Bluetooth disabled, eRouška cannot create a list of phones nearby.\n\nEnable it with the button \"Enable Bluetooth\".
Even though we don\'t use Location data, enable them in order for Bluetooth to work properly by using the button \"Enable Location Service\".

With Bluetooth and Location Services disabled, eRou\u0161ka cannot create a list of phones nearby.\n\nEven though we don\'t use Location data, please enable both services in order for Bluetooth to work properly by using the button \u201cEnable BT and Location Services\".
Application is running in the background and monitoring the surroundings. Please do not exit the application. Keep bluetooth enabled and use your phone as normal.

Application is now paused and is not collecting any data about your surroundings.\n\nEnable again the data collection and keep yourself and others safe. Don\'t forget to do that especially when leaving your home.
When you are suspected to be infected, we will contact you using phone number %s. We will ask you to upload an anonymized phone number list which can be found in the section My data.
Thank you for helping in fighting against the spread of coronavirus.\n\nPlease collaborate with hygienic station workers to find all the people you were in contact with.
I was contacted by hygienic workers
Your device does not support Bluetooth LE
eRouška needs Bluetooth to function properly

Bluetooth is part of Location Services. That\'s why we ask for permission to use Location tracking after you click the button \"Enable\". Confirm both requests so that the application can function properly.
You are the only one who can upload the collected data, and only when asked to do so by a hygienic station worker.
You don\'t have to worry, the application is not tracking your location nor does it save it.
Enter your phone number that will be used by a hygienic station worker only when somebody from your surroundings has tested positive for coronavirus.

I agree that the Ministry of Health can use the entered phone number and the collected data with meeting other application\'s users according to conditions for processing in case of an epidemic investigation.
Invalid phone number (must contain country prefix)
Error contacting server. Check network connection.
Too many phone number verification requests. You can try again in a couple of hours.
Verification code\'s validity expired. Check phone number and request a new verification code.

These are the recordings of signal measurements of surrounding phones with the application eRouška in the past %d days. Data does not contain location trackings nor does it contain any other personal data. You are the only one who can send the data to the hygienic workers.

plurals.name: my_data_count_part_2
plurals.item: you met %d user of application eRou\u0161ka.
You met %d users of the eRou\u0161ka application.

resources.string: Application was created within the initiative Covid19CZ. We\'ve developed it with focus on privacy protection so that we could use it ourselves as well. Data is stored only on your device and your location history can\'t be determined from it. Thank you for using the application and we believe that together we will overcome this epidemic.\n\neRou\u0161ka team
For proper application functionality a permission for location tracking needs to be granted.
More information about why that is can be found in Help.

Application will be monitoring your surroundings continuously and will record all other phones with the eRouška application you get in contact with.

If any of them tests positive for coronavirus, you will get contacted by phone by a hygienic station worker..

If you test positive, the hygienic station will contact all the other application users you were in contact with.

Independent audit guarantees, that the application does not send any personal data without your knowledge. You send them yourself and only to the hygienic workers.
Thanks to eRou\u0161ka you will keep yourself and others nearby safe
We sent a verification SMS to phone number %s.
Verification code was automatically filled from the SMS message.
Are you suspected to be infected with coronavirus?\n\nStay home and contact your general practitioner or your local hygienic station.

Do you need advice?

All questions and concerns about coronavirus should be answered on MZČR\'s website or free infoline %s.

About application eRouška

Do you need help with the application, or you want to know how does it works and how we process personal data? Take a look at web erouska.cz
Data was successfully uploaded, hygienic workers now have access to it.
Data was already uploaded. You can resend it again in %d minutes.

Were you asked by a hygienic station worker to send a list of phones that you were in contact with?

The Ministry of Health, and its employed hygienic workers, will use the sent data based on your consent in conditions of processing.

Hi, I\'m using application eRou\u0161ka. Install it too and together we can help stop the spread of coronavirus. The application is collecting anonymous data about phones nearby, so that the hygienic workers can more easily find potentially infected individuals. The more we are, the better it works. Application can be found at %s.

Are you sure you want to delete your collected data?

Hygienic workers will lose the possibility to use your contacts in case of you getting infected.

After data deletion, eRouška will be automatically paused.

Are you sure you want to cancel your phone's registration?

After cancelling your phone registration we can no longer contact you in case somebody from your surroundings gets tested positive.

If you are the one who gets tested positive, we will not be able to contact anybody from your surroundings.

With cancelling the registration, all the devices registered on phone number %s will have their application turned off.
Data upload failed. Please try it again later.
Your device does not have an active internet connection.
Your account doesn\'t exist anymore or you were logged out.
All data was deleted and eRou\u0161ka was paused

Thank you for helping against the spread of coronavirus.

Please collaborate with hygienic station workers to find all the people you were in contact with.

Stay in quarantine, limit contact with your family, and obey doctor’s and hygienist’s orders.
eRou\u0161ka needs to run in the background, but the phone is turning it off to save battery.\n\nDisable Battery Saver by clicking the button \"Disable Battery Saver\" in settings.
eRou\u0161ka needs to be active even when you are not using it
Your phone is automatically turning off some applications when you are not using them, to save battery life.
Enable running application in background in phone\'s settings. Guide for your phone can be found below.
Did you meet more people during the day? Check phone\'s settings. It is possible that the application is being turned off automatically.
Consent with conditions of processing is necessary for activating the application. Without your consent the application can\'t function.
Unexpected error occurred. Try it again later. If the error keeps occurring for a longer period, contact our support.
You didn\'t get SMS with verification code? Start using the application right now and verify your phone later.
Please verify your phone number so that we can contact you in case of being suspected of coronavirus infection.
